headline: Davos CEO Brief for Monday, January 19, 2026
summary: WSJ Leadership Institute President Alan Murray speaks with powerful CEOs and highlights some of the top issues being discussed at the World Economic Forum in Davos this week—from geopolitical challenges to the opportunities ahead in 2026.

headline: Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc. (MMC): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc. on r/valueinvesting by Key_Variety_6287. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MMC. Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc.’s share was trading at $182.70 as of January 15th. MMC’s trailing and forward P/E were 21.85 and 17.57 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: Marsh McLennan CEO John Doyle On the Biggest Risks of 2026
summary: WSJ Leadership Institute President Alan Murray speaks with Marsh McLennan CEO John Doyle on how geopolitics, climate-related insurance losses, and AI disruption are reshaping the risk landscape in 2026.

headline: 2 Oversold Stocks Primed to Rebound and 1 Facing Challenges
summary: The past year hasn't been kind to the stocks featured in this article. Each has tumbled to their lowest points in 12 months, leaving investors to decide whether they're witnessing fire sales or falling knives.
